questions.question: 1. Which kind of heat treatment is required for making a harder material.

explanations.a: Option A is incorrect since annealing makes a material softer due to slow cooling. here
explanations.b: Option B is correct since Quenching makes a material harder due to faster cooling rates.
explanations.c: Option C is not correct since both heat treatments serve different purposes.
explanations.d: Option D is not correct since the correct answer is Quenching.
